divs: Sighting DetailsMy way to work saw snack shop every day a woman from saint petersburg owned shop in lake worth ,Florida off 10th avenue I was just about there 2 buildings from Shalloway Surveyors I worked there.Hovering after choosing spot driven to that IFO went to shoot once missed with lasar then fired lasar again the lasar disc is out and up above ship like 15 feet shot at Columbia shuttle nasa had killing all members of crew I have read of the inncodent and seen many photos of the lasers that did it but not the ship.I wrote to mufon years afo about 7 page forms mufon signs and I also have seen dragons fight in sky of baltimore city to north skies yes both inncodents were real the dragons live on this planet sometimes breathe fire .The inncodent occured I stood and stared at IFO and thought it left flew away later that day I went to see my neice born at good samaritan hospital at noon on same day I think jan 28 1986 you can match real day it occurred I know I was there.Thanks for all your help.
Summary: 100 guns and lasar disc only quiet non trackable form driven hovering IFO
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Worth
There were no other sightings in Lake Worth on or around January 28th 1986
